page.title: 08Village Girl's Day
page.content: I rise at 8 am. and put on my blue school skirt and blouse.For breakfast I usually have Crunchy Nut Cornflakes or Rice Krispies.At 8.35 am.I make my bed then go to the shop before heading for school where the bell rings at 8.55 am.At 12.05 pm.I walk home and have my lunch but most people stay for school dinners.We go to school again at 1.00 pm. and stay until 3.30 pm. If the weather is nice I go to the park but,before I do anything else,I clean my rabbit's hutch.Mostly I watch television and my favourite programme is "Up Our Street"on B.B.C.1.My favourite meal is Fray Bentos steak pie and chips.After tea I practise my music as I play the piano,recorder and violin.Between 8.30-9.00pm.I go to bed and read.My favourite author is Enyd Blyton.
